mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bcategory, bimage, bcount) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, #{bcategory},#{bimage}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE bcategory IS NOT NULL ORDER BY bno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent}, bwriter = #{bwriter}, bcategory = #{bcategory}, bimage = #{bimage} WHERE bno = #{bno}
UPDATE board SET bcount = bcount +1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
